title: Critical Skill Specialist Readiness
description: A joint task force commander needs to identify all available personnel with a critical skill (e.g., a specific foreign language) across all branches of service.

tasks.description: Query the joint personnel database for all service members with the specified language skill code.
tasks.expected_outcome: Commander retrieves a list of all personnel with the required skill.

tasks.description: Filter the list to show only those who are currently deployable.
tasks.expected_outcome: Commander narrows the list to only available personnel.

tasks.description: Generate a report with the names, ranks, and current units of the available specialists.
tasks.expected_outcome: Commander has an actionable list of specialists who can be tasked.
